Title: Creating Service to connect to TFS
Description: The project is for testing purposes. It will consist of WCF service that will connect to TFS and will do some TFS API calls to mimic the TEAM Explorer behavior from VS 2010. It is a project for the Univirsity though.
HomeWiki:
This project is for testing purposes. We need to find out how to use TFS API and create web serivice to use it!
